author: Shane Harris, Shane Harris
title: Coronavirus: Michigan hospital system to test workers' blood in effort to reopen country
description: The Centres for Disease Control and Prevention estimates that one in four people who carry the virus do not show symptoms
content: The biggest hospital system in Michigan is launching whats believed to be the nations largest test for novel coronavirus antibodies. The study could determine who has already been infected with the virus and may now be immune to it information that public hea… [+5127 chars]
